comments.author: Proxy-Sale
comments.body: What is WebRTC, and how to disable and avoid data leakage in popular browsers?WebRTC is a feature in your browser that streams audio and video data over the network. It can be used to create video conferences without the help of Zoom or Skype.But more often this technology does more harm than good. A minimal number of people use it for its intended purpose, and everyone else can become victims of hackers and data leaks via WebRTC. It saves your IP address and accesses your microphone and camera - all this data is in an open network, which scammers can use.Therefore, we recommend disabling WebRTC on your devices. Let's see how to do this in popular browsers:Read more

comments.author: Proxy-Sale
comments.body: IPv6 proxy format is still a relatively new format, so it does not work as well as its previous version. Currently supports the new proxy format of 6 main sites: Facebook, Instagram, Telegram, Youtube, Google. If one of the listed sites is your goal, you can safely place an order. If your target is not in the listed list, you will need to purchase an IPv4 proxy. IPv4 is a reliable format that works with any sites and programs, moreover, its operation is stable and virtually uninterrupted, for high-quality work on the network, we recommend buying an IPv4 proxy format.So for your goal we recommend to purchase IPv4 ones.

comments.author: Proxy-Sale
comments.body: How to set up a proxy in GoLoginGoLogin is a multi-account anti-detect browser. You can create and manage an unlimited number of accounts on social networks or websites. GoLogin saves each profile in a separate cloud to protect your data and ensure complete online anonymity. The browser allows you to choose different tariff plans, depending on how many accounts you want to use.For maximum security, GoLogin has the ability to set up a proxy server. So you can change the IP addresses of the profile, and bypass blocking, or regional restrictions. Using a different address for each profile is important - because if you maintain accounts from the same IP, the site may block them.Video tutorial for proxy configuration in GoLogin: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B3VCuI-DWW4Here is our article: https://proxy-sale.com/company/articles/browser-proxy/proxy-settings-tutorial-for-gologin-anti-detect-browser/

It can be used to create video conferences without the help of Zoom or Skype.But more often this technology does more harm than good. A minimal number of people use it for its intended purpose, and everyone else can become victims of hackers and data leaks via WebRTC. comments.author: Proxy-Sale
comments.body: What is Web Scraping and what proxies to use?Web scraping is a procedure of collecting information from various web resources, organazing it into tables, and using it for marketing, research, and other purposes. Sometimes scraping is called parsing. Parsing is practically the same as Web Scraping, so in this article, we will use these two terms as synonyms.The work of this system consists in "scraping" the necessary information and takes place in several stages:¬† ¬† ‚Ä¢ Keywords, numbers, or phrases are entered into the program;¬† ¬† ‚Ä¢ The system visits various sites and collects the necessary data.¬† ¬† ‚Ä¢ All information is automatically analyzed and sorted into tables so it is convenient to use further.Why do you need a proxy for web scraping and which proxies to use:Read the full article: https://proxy-sale.com/company/articles/general-articles/what-is-web-scraping-and-what-proxies-to-use/

comments.author: Proxy-Sale
comments.body: PSN proxy on PlayStation 4 & 5Why do I need a Proxy for PS4/PS5?The main restrictions arise just because of being in a certain country, and you need the proxy to change the location and unlock the Playstation Network. Then the system will think that you are accessing the network from another region, and will not block access for you. Also, a proxy will hide your IP address, provide reliable protection against hacks and malware, and speed up your Internet connection. Your console will work quickly, without interruptions and restrictions.In this video, we will show you how to find a proxy server that works with PlayStation and how to configure your PlayStation to use a proxy serverVideo tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fXJpC2dAdFMSubscribe to our YouTube channel to stay up-to-date on the latest news and tips on using proxy servers.
